attributes.action: Create equality between England and Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create equality between England and Scotland. University fees, presciption costs and elderly care should be the same nationwide. As an English woman, I feel that I am the poor relative of the rest of the former United Kingdom. Complete equality or complete devolution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
